name: Coots the Cat
description:
Coots the Cat

This is a "heck around and find out" cozy game.
You play as Coots, the young white female Scottish-fold cat of QTCinderella & Ludwig.
This game was made as part of the LudwigJam2023.
 (G-Drive link)

See if you are big brain enough to unlock all 8 endings.
E = Interact, F = Whack, Q = Meow, WASD = move

Credits: 
Programming: Cookins
Art & Graphics: JeiDoll

Additional credits: 
meow, lofi, other sound effects
